record.dc:title: 23Mg66 Penn Site, Morgan County, Alabama. Feature #20 located in 70R2. It is a possible refuse pit with dimentions of 9.5' x 2.0' x 3.05' deep. In the pit were found F.S. #40 (1 piece of galena) and F.S. #39 (10 pieces of worked stone and 7 sherds).
record.dc:creator: Wayne W. Kraxberger
record.wpa:narrative: Feature #20 located in 70R2. It is a well defined possible refuse pit with dimentions of 9.5' x 2.0' x 3.05' deep. Fill consisted of a blueish grey clay mixed with yellow iron stained clay. Rising water into the pits made them difficult to excavate. In the pit were found F.S. #40 (1 piece of galena) and F.S. #39 (10 pieces of worked stone and 7 sherds).
